description: Color palette for the Next.js emissions dashboard, inspired by Climate Action Tracker, aiming for WCAG AA compliance.

notes.wcag_compliance: Contrast ratios should be checked for text on these backgrounds. E.g., #00a4bd (Teal) on #FFFFFF (White) for button text needs verification if teal is bg. White text on #00a4bd has a ratio of 3.25:1, which is AA for large text.
notes.text_on_banner: #FFFFFF on #87cde7 has a contrast ratio of approx 3.0:1 for normal text, which is AA for large text (18pt+ or 14pt+ bold). Consider bold or larger text for banner titles.
notes.chart_text_contrast: Ensure chart axis/legend text has sufficient contrast against chart background (if not transparent). #B0BEC5 on #2C3E50 is 7.05:1. #666666 on #FFFFFF is 7.06:1.
